Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.ActionTokens

package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.ActionTokens
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    ActionToken
    Represent an action token for single player games.
    Shuffler
    Interface for classes who has elements which needs to be shuffled.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    ActionDeck
    Represent the action tokens deck for the single player game
    BlackCrossActionToken
    Represent an action token that move the position of the black cross (cpu token) on the Vatican route
    DiscardActionToken
    Represent an action token that remove cards of a certain color from the card market
